import{getUrl}from"../utils/getUrl";export const updateAnswer=async answer=>{//TODO make enum list
const fetchUrl=getUrl('update-answer');try{const transformedData={answer:answer.answer,id:answer.id,isCorrect:answer.isCorrect};const response=await fetch("".concat(fetchUrl),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},credentials:"include",body:JSON.stringify(transformedData)});if(response.ok){window.location.href=response.headers.get("Location")||"/quiz";}}catch(error){console.error("Error setting session data:",error);}};
